name: Rug Munch Intelligence
description: Token risk intelligence API for AI agents. 14 x402 endpoints: rug pull detection ($0.02), premium forensics ($0.05), batch screening ($0.15/20), deployer tracking, holder deep-dive with sniper/bundle detection, KOL shill analysis, social OSINT, and real-time token watch with webhook alerts ($0.10/7d). The only comprehensive crypto risk API on x402. Accepts USDC on Base and Solana.
